The '''Treasure Hoarders' Treasure Map''' is a Quest Item used to complete the Hidden Exploration Objective [[Lumenspar in the Den of Thieves]]. This quest item can be obtained by finding both of the [[Treasure Map Fragment (The Chasm)|Treasure Map Fragments]].
